channel.title: Review Again(Machanism) on AWS Well-Architected Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Review Again(Machanism) on AWS Well-Architected Labs

item.title: Again AWS Well-Architected Review using Well-Architected tool
item.description: Review based on pillars with best practices applied. Log-in AWS console, typing Well-Architected Tools in service search bar. you can go to this link : https://console.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/. In the previously created workload, Workload for AWS Workshop, click AWS Well-Architected Framework. Then click on each filler to check the question that corresponds to the best practice applied. operational excellence as an example. Select Operational Excellence at the bottom.
